summary: A tale of revenge, honor and disgrace, centering on a poverty-stricken samurai who discovers the fate of his ronin son-in-law, setting in motion a tense showdown of vengeance against the house of a feudal lord.
cast: Kôji Yakusho|Munetaka Aoki|Naoto Takenaka|Hikari Mitsushima|Eita|Ebizô Ichikawa|Hirofumi Arai|Kazuki Namioka|Takashi Sasano|Ayumu Saitô|Goro Daimon|Takehiro Hira|Baijaku Nakamura|Yoshihisa Amano|Ippei Takahashi
title: Hara-Kiri: muerte de un samurai
